perturbation.original_text: 3.02     PAYMENT.  The  Affiliate's Fee payable pursuant to this agreement shall be  payable  as  outlined in Exhibit A. All payments to Affiliate are subject to Network  1  receipt  of all amounts payable to Network 1 by the Member Bank with respect  to the transaction giving rise to Affiliate's Fee. Network 1 shall have no  liability  with  respect  to  the  payment  of such Affiliate's Fee (for any specific  Merchant)  under  Section 3.01  [AMOUNT] unless and until Network 1 receives the above  referenced  payment for Merchant.  In the event Merchant rejects fees for any  reason,  the  fees  due to Affiliate shall not be due and only payable upon Network 1's receipt of such payment. Payments will be made on or before the 25th of  each  calendar  month.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.02     PAYMENT.  The  Affiliate's Fee payable pursuant to this agreement shall be  payable  as  outlined in Exhibit A. All payments to Affiliate are subject to Network  1  receipt  of all amounts payable to Network 1 by the Member Bank with respect  to the transaction giving rise to Affiliate's Fee. Network 1 shall have no  liability  with  respect  to  the  payment  of such Affiliate's Fee (for any specific  Merchant)  under  Section 3.01  [AMOUNT] unless and until Network 1 receives the above  referenced  payment for Merchant.  In the event Merchant rejects fees for any  reason,  the  fees  due to Affiliate shall not be due and only payable upon Network 1's receipt of such payment. Payments will be made on or before the 15th of  each  calendar  month.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by modifying the payment deadline. The original text states payments will be made on or before the 25th of each month, while the modified text states payments will be made on or before the 15th of each month. This creates uncertainty about the actual due date.

perturbation.original_text: 5.01     TERM.  The  term  ("Term")  of  this Agreement shall be for one hundred eighty  days  (180)  from  the  date set forth below unless Network 1 or Visa or MasterCard  or Harris Bank doesn't approve Affiliate's ISO application, in which case,  the  Term  will  be  3 years. This Agreement will automatically renew for successive  one-year  terms  unless  terminated by either party by providing the other  with  30  days  written notice that this Agreement will not be renewed or Affiliate  enters  into  a  Processing  agreement  with  Network  1  and  an ISO Sponsorship  agreement  with  Harris  Bank  in  which  case  this Agreement will automatically  terminate  concurrent  with  the  execution  of  such agreements.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.01     TERM.  The  term  ("Term")  of  this Agreement shall be for one hundred eighty  days  (180)  from  the  date set forth below unless Network 1 or Visa or MasterCard  or Harris Bank doesn't approve Affiliate's ISO application, in which case,  the  Term  will  be  1 years. This Agreement will automatically renew for successive  one-year  terms  unless  terminated by either party by providing the other  with  30  days  written notice that this Agreement will not be renewed or Affiliate  enters  into  a  Processing  agreement  with  Network  1  and  an ISO Sponsorship  agreement  with  Harris  Bank  in  which  case  this Agreement will automatically  terminate  concurrent  with  the  execution  of  such agreements.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies a 3-year term if the ISO application is not approved, but the modified text reduces this to 1 year, creating a conflict in the duration of the agreement under specific conditions.

perturbation.original_text: 5.03     EFFECT  OF  TERMINATION.  Upon termination of this Agreement, except in the  event  of  termination  due  to an uncured default by Affiliate pursuant to Section  5.02  [TERMINATION]A, Network 1 shall continue to pay to the Affiliate the Affiliate's Fee  described  in  Section  3.01  [AMOUNT]B for so long as Network 1 continues to process transactions  of the Merchants in accordance with Schedule B attached hereto and Affiliate  continues  to maintain the merchant accounts, provided, however, that no such Affiliate's Fees shall be earned or paid for any calendar month in which the  Affiliate's  Fee  does not exceed $500.  Upon termination due to an uncured default  by  Affiliate,  or  termination for cause pursuant to Section 5.02  [TERMINATION]D all Affiliates  fees  shall  cease  to  be  accrued  and  paid  immediately upon the occurrence  of  said  event.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.03     EFFECT  OF  TERMINATION.  Upon termination of this Agreement, except in the  event  of  termination  due  to an uncured default by Affiliate pursuant to Section  5.02  [TERMINATION]A, Network 1 shall continue to pay to the Affiliate the Affiliate's Fee  described  in  Section  3.01  [AMOUNT]B for so long as Network 1 continues to process transactions  of the Merchants in accordance with Schedule B attached hereto and Affiliate  continues  to maintain the merchant accounts, provided, however, that no such Affiliate's Fees shall be earned or paid for any calendar month in which the  Affiliate's  Fee  does not exceed $500.  Upon termination due to an uncured default  by  Affiliate,  or  termination for cause pursuant to Section 5.02  [TERMINATION]D all Affiliates  fees  shall  cease  to  be  accrued  and  paid  30 days after the  occurrence  of  said  event.
perturbation.explanation: This alteration introduces a contradiction regarding when payments cease upon termination for cause or uncured default. The original text states fees cease immediately, while the modified text allows for a 30-day period after the event before payments stop. This creates confusion as to the exact timing of payment cessation.
